Comments_List: I learned how to distribute my time wisely in order to be prepared for the online forums and exams.
I learned about babies' mental processes and conceptions of number, space, emotion, etc. and how this compares to animals and adult humans.

I learned about certain mental capacities commonly held by humans and animals and about the complexity of non-human cognitive capacities. I also learned about the amazing abilities of the human brain that are specific to humans.

Strengths- great discussions, lectures , and question sets
No weaknesses in this course. 
Maybe more discussions would be beneficial.
No weaknesses! This course was fantasticamazing professor and great lectures.
The flipped classroom design is conducive to learning in an online setting. The lectures and readings were very informative.
Yes! This is such an interesting course. You learn a lot and the Professor is amazing!!

Yes, I would because it was fascinating and I personally learned a lot of things that I would of not otherwise have learned if I had not taken this course.
It was also slightly challenging , but it pushes you to do better!

I would definitely recommend! It changes your point of view on babies and animals and makes you realize that we aren't actually all that different. Stydying babies and animals also really gives insight into our own cognition.

I would definitely recommend this course because the material is engaging and interesting without being too challenging. I learned a lot in this class without having to be stressed out by the workload.
